tensequestions.question: Fill in with past perfect tense: I ______ my homework when my uncle arrived.
The statement 'I have written a letter' belongs to which of these tenses?
Which of these is an example of simple present tense?
tensequestions.answer1: A) I am going to Delhi tomorrow.
tensequestions.answer3: C) He has just gone out.
tensequestions.answer4: D) I am reading the gita.

tensequestions.question: To which of these tenses does the following statement belong? We were watching television all day.
Choose the correct statement:
tensequestions.answer1: A) I should take more exercise.
tensequestions.answer2: B) I should have more exercise.
tensequestions.answer3: C) I should make more exercise.
tensequestions.answer4: D) I should give more exercise.
tensequestions.correct: A) I should take more exercise.

tensequestions.question: Fill in the blank: My watch is five minutes ______.
Fill in the blank: The thief has ______ all my belongings.
Choose the correct statement:
tensequestions.answer1: A) I was a student for over three years now.
tensequestions.answer2: B) I am a student for over three years now.
tensequestions.answer3: C) I have been a student for over three years now.
tensequestions.answer4: D) I am being a student for over three years now.
tensequestions.correct: C) I have been a student for over three years now.

tensequestions.question: Which of these statements belongs to perfect continuous tense?
Which of these statements belong to present continuous tense (plural)?
tensequestions.answer1: A) They were writing a letter.
tensequestions.answer2: B) She is writing a letter.
tensequestions.answer3: C) We are writing a letter.
tensequestions.answer4: D) We were writing a letter.
tensequestions.correct: C) We are writing a letter.
